body: Dr Geoff Wade discusses the changing history syllabus in Malaysian schools. The author notes that 'half of the country disappeared' in the history syllabus focusing on Malays.
original_body: Dr Geoff Wade discusses the changing history syllabus in Malaysian schools. The author notes that 'half of the country disappeared' in the history syllabus focusing on Malays.
title: Malaysia: Critique of history syllabus
